title: Plan for Change: Blocking screen capture in the latest Intune App SDK for iOS and Intune App Wrapping Tool for iOS
content: We recently released updated versions of the Intune App SDK and the Intune App Wrapping Tool. Included in these releases (v19.7.5+ for Xcode 15 and v20.2.0+ for Xcode 16) is the support for blocking screen capture, Genmojis, and writing tools in response to the new AI features in iOS/iPadOS 18.2.
